subject: This week's component news: $50,000+ in contests
body:
Hello sm1lies, 

We've got more than $53,000 in component prizes this week. Here are the highlights:
1. Special cash bonus on TimeTrack projects  
2. Spotlight on: RPT components

=================================================================
1. SPECIAL CASH BONUS ON TIMETRACKER PROJECTS

Help shape the future of TopCoder by participating in 1 of 11 special competitions to help develop an internal time management system that will be used by TopCoder employees and members. 

All members who participate in this competition will receive a special $100.00 cash bonus, simply by submitting a milestone -- and you do not have to be the 1st or 2nd prize winner in order to collect your bonus! With a total of $16,500+ in prizes, the stakes are high and the competition will be fierce. 

See the list of development projects (below), or go here for details: 
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113.

Sign up now!


=================================================================
2. SPOTLIGHT ON: RPT DESIGN PROJECTS

As you might have noticed, last week TopCoder posted a component design competition that involves Rational(R) Performance Tester (RPT). More RPT-related design competitions launched today, and more are on the way soon. To get up to speed on RPT, check out this TopCoder article: 
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tutorials&d2=rationalPerformanceTester
